channel.title: [PI] making areas "safe" [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I recently moved my server's home from edgeville to yanille. I ran into a problem though. You cant attack anyone because its a safe area, but you also cant trade because it's still considered "wilderness". how can i fix this? any help would be glorious :o
*resolved*

item.title: [PI] making areas "safe" [PI]
